subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Wayne Rooney said Sunday was “one of the worst days I’ve ever had in football” as Manchester United, the defending champions in the English Premier League, lost 3-0 to Liverpool at home.
snippet: Wayne Rooney said Sunday was “one of the worst days I’ve ever had in football” as Manchester United, the defending champions in the English Premier League, lost 3-0 to Liverpool at home.
